docs.text: Hi! ¶ Hi. My name is Ruben and I participate in the Master in Design for Emergent Futures program at the Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia in Barcelona, Spain. With this website I keep track of my findings, progression, reflections and encounters that I experience along this course. Thanks for joining me!
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Hi. My name is Ruben and I participate in the Master in Design for Emergent Futures program at the Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia in Barcelona, Spain. With this website I keep track of my findings, progression, reflections and encounters that I experience along this course. Thanks for joining me!
docs.title: Hi!

docs.text: About ¶ My name is Ruben de Haan and last september 10th I moved from my hometown Rouveen, NL to Barcelona, ES to pursue the MDEF (Master in Design for Emergent Futures) at the Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia. With this website I aim to document my learnings and experiences. my website
docs.title: About

docs.text: My name is Ruben de Haan and last september 10th I moved from my hometown Rouveen, NL to Barcelona, ES to pursue the MDEF (Master in Design for Emergent Futures) at the Institute for Advanced Architecture of Catalonia. With this website I aim to document my learnings and experiences. my website
